body: OK, thanks for the clarification. I actually did not know about this interaction between static methods and inheritence in Java. You learn something new every day, I guess. I will try to make this change as soon as possible.
Thank you, it will be great.

issue.title: Make Assertions.assertThat and BDDAssertions.assertThat return abstract ...

repository.name: assertj
repository.description: Fluent testing assertions for Java and the JVM

issue.body: ...assertion types instead of concrete ones - fixes #220

body: I've created a pull request fixing the issue.
You are right and I will do that also for the other returned types too.
